description: Blend of hush +‎ lullaby or hush +‎ -a- (connective interfix) +‎ by (“goodbye, as in bye-bye”).

entries.meaning: A lullaby used to soothe babies to sleep.

verbs.description: hushaby (third-person singular simple present hushabies, present participle hushabying, simple past and past participle hushabied)

entries.meaning: (archaic, transitive) To lull to sleep by saying "hushaby".
